Author: halfwayamused
Text: I've been feeling the same way all week

Author: addisonisanidiot
Text: i’ve been feeling this way for the last 4-5 months. at this point i’m only existing, not living. i’m here but i’m really not. all i can say is that it’s normal to feel this way when you consider what you’re going through and it’s not your fault if you aren’t equipped with the skills to handle it all. you’re doing the best you can. it’s okay to take a step back and let go of trying to be in control. it’s okay to need time to be useless (as bam would say). i’ve taken a break from seeing friends, from going to work, from studying, from trying to convince myself that this is worth it. it doesn’t need to be worth it right now. i wake up. sometimes i get up. sometimes i make it outside. most times i don’t. we’re going through phases. i don’t know if it gets better, but change is inevitable. things will be different some day.  you’re not alone.
